page.title: 02Homelife in D-Block
page.content:
{A morning in the life of {Adrian Woolley 1A
A normal day in my house starts at 8.00am when I wake up. The first thing I do is get dressed; into a blue shirt, black jumper, maroon tie and black trousers. I wear these clothes because they are my school uniform. I have my breakfast at 8.05am - a cup of coffee and some biscuits. Then I feed my rabbit, he is white with black ears, his name is Starsky. I give him some water and Bunny Mix (Wheat, Oats and Sunflower seeds), I am very fond of him. I have a wash with Zest soap and clean my teeth with Colgate toothpaste. I leave my house at 8.25am and call for my friend Justin, together we walk to Blacon High School.
